Snippet.name: Wizard
Snippet.text: C_:pause:10: Well Ollie, now you see just how brave you are?:C_:pause:4

Snippet.name: Wizard
Snippet.text: As promised, I return your family to you.:C_:pause:20:C_:end:null

Snippet.name: Mago
Snippet.text: C_:pause:10: Bueno Ollie! Ahora usted ve apenas lo valiente que eres?:C_:pause:4

Snippet.name: Mago
Snippet.text: Como le prometÃ­, ahora regrese a su familia para usted.:C_:pause:20:C_:end:null
